html: 4.17.19  12:08 am   i infuse a lot of uncertainty into my speaking/writing. "maybe", "it seems", "probably", "could be", ect. on one hand i think i am just trying to accurately convey reality. on the other hand, most professions frown on this

4.16.19  5:40 am   Ok Bill.. I have a serious problem. It's been two years that I constantly (almost every day) try to write songs and, since I'm in an apartment, I write music by recording it (midi, looping ecc.). Every time I feel having a good idea I'm completely focus for the first hour then I go face down to bed and think, for the next days, that I had bad music ideas for that project in a way that makes me want to avoid it in the future. What should I do? I'm very sick of this.. I want to get things done..
